content.question: Assume firms increase their borrowing in order to expand capacity. How will this additional borrowing affect the loanable funds market?

choices.label: The supply of loanable funds curve will shift to the left.
The supply of loanable funds curve will shift to the right.
The demand for loanable funds curve will shift to the left.
The demand for loanable funds curve will shift to the right.
The loanable funds market will not be affected.

content.answer: The demand for loanable funds curve will shift to the right.
